Issue.creator: xwu
Issue.summary: The name of the test function does not match the corresponding function
Issue.description: In file common/util/utils_test.go, function TestMetadataSignatureBytesNormal and TestMetadataSignatureBytesNil are used to test function ConcatenateBytes in utils.go. But "MetadataSignature" in the function names is misleading, and should be modified to "Concatenate" to correspond to the function ConcatenateBytes.
